About us

Software

Chorus2

Oligo FISH probe design software.

CRISPR-BETS

gRNA design software for base editing knockout system.

CRISPRMatch

An automatic calculation and visualization tool for high-throughput CRISPR genome-editing data analysis.

Popera

DHS identification software.

Chorus2 oligo database

The oligo database current host oligo sequences of six species, including Arabidopsis, rice, maize, potato, barley and soybean. The details of the oligos are showed in the bellow table.
